entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is being called out by Ron and Luna in the darkness, indicating that he is present.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is shouting for Harry and trying to get their attention, suggesting that he is also present.

entities.name: luna
entities.description: Luna responds to Ron's call, indicating that she is present and able to help them.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione screams from overhead, suggesting that she is also present but in a different location.

entities.name: bellatrix
entities.description: Bellatrix is screaming and shouting, indicating that she is present and causing trouble.

entities.name: mr. ollivander
entities.description: Mr. Ollivander is mentioned as someone who might have the nail they need to break their ropes.

relationships.description: Harry and Ron are communicating with each other, trying to figure out what's going on.
Luna is helping Harry by digging at the rope's fibers to work the knots free.
Bellatrix and Hermione are in conflict, with Bellatrix screaming and shouting from upstairs.
